public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
Gong'an county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei

sentences.english: When a public security organ demands the arrest of an offender, it shall obtain the approval of a people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 公安机关要求逮捕人犯的时候，由人民检察院批准。

sentences.english: An investigation team led by the provincial public security department has been formed.
sentences.chinese: 省公安厅为此成立的一个案件调查小组。

sentences.english: Receive alarm hind, prefectural public security bureau and department of propaganda of county Party committee undertook checking instantly.
sentences.chinese: 接警后，县公安局与县委宣传部立即进行了核查。

sentences.english: Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀华新疆维吾尔自治区公安厅厅长职务。

sentences.english: Police academy is a part of the ordinary colleges.

sentences.english: The public security organ shall carry out examination in the course of transportation of precursor chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 公安机关应当在易制毒化学品的运输过程中进行检查。

sentences.english: Only one-third of the price is required of the student body.
sentences.chinese: 上海公安博物馆对学生团体实行三分之一票价。

sentences.english: The intelligence information work is in the guiding position in the whole public security work.
sentences.chinese: 情报信息工作在整个公安工作中居于先导地位。

sentences.english: At present, the Public Security Bureau has been sounding instrument for proper disposal.
sentences.chinese: 目前，该探空仪已由公安分局妥善处置。

sentences.english: New era brings forward new requirements for local police directors.
sentences.chinese: 新时期对公安派出所所长提出新的要求。

sentences.english: Article 30 The Municipal Public Security Bureau are responsible for the interpretation of the specific application of the present regulations.
sentences.chinese: 第三十条本条例的具体应用问题由市公安局负责解释。

sentences.english: The public security organ or the people's procuratorate shall inform the prison of the result of its handling.
sentences.chinese: 公安机关或者人民检察院应当将处理结果通知监狱。

sentences.english: In the first part , it dissects formational reasons of people"s polices violating the law and discipline in public security organs ."
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，剖析公安民警违法违纪行为的成因。

sentences.english: Tangmou said that when she found that when the law on public security organs to the police.
sentences.chinese: 唐某称，当她发现违法时，就向公安机关报警了。

sentences.english: False then the passengers and the public security organ for handling by the airport.
sentences.chinese: 随后将该旅客和假证交由机场公安机关处理。

sentences.english: Well with superior departments and the competent departments of public security communication and relationship.
sentences.chinese: 同时做好与上级部门和公安主管部门的沟通和联系。
